message: Hello, I'm Jessica Davidson.I recently ordered a set of tires, but upon inspection, I found that they have significant tread wear, indicating they are used. The tires were supposed to be brand new and specifically designed for all weather performance.This is order A15-3489

Hello, I'm Sarah Stevens.I recently ordered a wireless speaker from your store, but I received the wrong color than what was ordered. My order reference is 852721. Could you please assist in resolving this issue at the earliest convenience, as I have an upcoming event where I was int.My order was D541236

Hi! This is Jessica Green.I recently ordered a brake pad set for my car from your online store. After installing them, I noticed a strange noise coming from the wheels along with a reduced braking efficiency.My order was A123456
